ygData.subject: Re: Having troubles...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never been to kill those chicks, but heard others talking about them as well.  But when I was in a good 3 or 4 man party in oasis, I was leveling every 2
ygData.messageBody:
I've never been to kill those chicks, but heard others talking about them as well. But when I was in a good 3 or 4 man party in oasis, I was leveling every 2 ï¿½ to 3 hours, so didn't really want to leave to go exploring :)

>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.25.99 12:10:52 AM >>>
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

That place is way to crowded. I prefer the aviaks in lake rathe, great xp
even at level 21 would you believe it. I always take friends there who have
had bad days, and help them re-level and get a buffer of xp.

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 12:25 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Having troubles...
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Gators, kill gators in oasis, great xp, no loot, but you'll be able to lvl
> up to 20 in no time, than you can go hunt for loot.
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.24.99 1:23:09 AM >>>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Hmmm what did I do a level 15 as a DE.
>
> I grouped. No more soloing for you full stop. Blues can kill you now or
> the down times are way to long. I hunted in the Gorge of King Xorbb at
> 15.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Tom Swift[SMTP:tswift@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 6:00 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Having troubles...
> >
> > I am a bit lost as to where I should be hunting right now.
> >
> > I have reached level 15, I am almost 16. I have maxed both dual wield
> and
> > double attack at 80 each. I seem to be having trouble effectively
> > hunting. Anything that cons white to me is always a tough fight that
> can
> > go either way, so I usually end up sticking to blue critters. However
> > some blue critters are just to tough to solo. Lava basilisks are a
> no-no
> > because of Stone Breath, fire elementals have some kind of damage shield
> > which causes me damage each time I hit so they are a no-no also.
> > Lavastorm being my preferred hunting area right now. I tried crocs in
> > Oasis, but it is to crowded when I play (8pm-10pm) for me to even find
> > anything to kill.
> >
> > I guess I am at that awkward level and was looking for advice from other
> > warriors on how they got fro 15 to 16.
> >
> > Bael
> > Warrior of the 15th Order
> > Indigo Brotherhood of the Tier'dal
> >
>
